void eol_sprite_init ()
 set up the sprite system for use. Must be called before any sprite functions are used. eol_graphics_init() must have been previously called.
eolSprite * eol_sprite_get_loaded_by_filename (eolLine filename)
eolSprite * eol_sprite_new ()
 creates a blank sprite and returns it. surface and gl texture data are not set. This could use be used in a custome sprite set up such as storing the test rendered from the font system.

 Load the sprite from file, or if it has already been loaded, get a pointer to the one in memory.

Definition at line 329 of file eol_sprite.c.

void eol_sprite_draw_3d ( eolSprite *  sprite,
eolUint  frame,
eolVec3D  position,
eolVec3D  scale,
eolFloat  alpha 
)

draw a sprite in 3D space oriented towards the camera in "billboard" style

Parameters:
sprite the sprite to draw
frame the frame to draw
position the position in space to draw the sprite
scale the scale to apply to the sprite. 1,1,1 is no scale
alpha the transparency of the draw. 0 is clear, 1 is solid

Definition at line 242 of file eol_sprite.c.

void eol_sprite_draw_transformed ( eolSprite *  sprite,
eolUint  frame,
eolInt  x,
eolInt  y,
eolFloat  scaleX,
eolFloat  scaleY,
eolFloat  rotation,
eolBool  hFlip,
eolBool  vFlip,
eolVec3D  color,
eolFloat  alpha 
)

draw a given sprite to the screen buffer with the given transformation information

Parameters:
sprite the sprite to be drawn
frame the frame to draw
x the x position to draw the sprite y the y position to draw the sprite
scaleX the x scaling factor to be aplied
scaleY the y scaling factor to be aplied
rotation the rotation, in degrees to draw the sprite
hFlip if true, the sprite will be flipped horizontally
vFlip if true, the sprite will be flipped vertically
color a vector of (R,G,B) color shift. (1,1,1) is no shift
alpha the transparency of the draw. 0 is clear, 1 is solid

Definition at line 351 of file eol_sprite.c.

void eol_sprite_draw_transformed_3d ( eolSprite *  sprite,
eolUint  frame,
eolVec3D  position,
eolVec3D  scale,
eolVec3D  rotation,
eolVec3D  color,
eolFloat  alpha 
)

draw a sprite in 3D space

Parameters:
sprite the sprite to draw
frame the frame to draw
position the position in space to draw the sprite
scale the scale to apply to the sprite. 1,1,1 is no scale
rotation the orientation to apply to the sprite
color a vector of (R,G,B) color shift. (1,1,1) is no shift
alpha the transparency of the draw. 0 is clear, 1 is solid

Definition at line 261 of file eol_sprite.c.

void eol_sprite_free ( eolSprite **  sprite  ) 

free the given sprite

Parameters:
sprite a pointer to the sprite pointer. the sprite will be freed and the pointer to the sprite will be set to NULL;

eolSprite* eol_sprite_load ( eolLine  filename,
eolUint  frameWidth,
eolUint  frameHeight 
)

Load the sprite from file, or if it has already been loaded, get a pointer to the one in memory.

Parameters:
filename the sprite file to load
frameWidth the width of an individual frame in pixels
frameHeight the height of an individual frame in pixels
